document_data.name: Nelthaug
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nethaug''' was a [[goblin]] chieftain of the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/74/Seven Swords|22}}

Involved in the [[Goblin Wars]] in the {{YearlinkName|753}}, Nethaug participating in the sacking of [[Mirabar]]. Nethaug raided the tomb of Prince [[Ereskas Torlath]] and stole the [[enchanted]] sword ''[[Namarra]]''. Following the war, goblins were rendered nearly extinct in the North. However, Nethaug, with ''Namarra'' in hand, and others escaped back into the [[Spine of the World]], into a ravine so remote that they would hold it securely well into the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
